sentences.en: He did everything in a leisurely manner.
sentences.cn: 无论干什么,他都是悠然自得的.

sentences.en: He drove at a leisurely pace.

sentences.cn: 他悠然自得地洗了个澡.

sentences.en: He flies in leisurely circles high in the sky.
sentences.cn: 悠然飘浮,他在高空来回.

sentences.en: In a leisurely way he unfolded his arms and turned away.
sentences.cn: 他懒洋洋地放下了两条臂膀走开了.

sentences.en: Job Legh took the candle up, and began a leisurely inspection.
sentences.cn: 约伯举起了蜡烛, 仔仔细细地对着她看.

sentences.en: Nari Herring walked leisurely along the sand.
sentences.cn: 纳里·赫林沿着沙滩悠闲地走动.

sentences.en: The boy sat there, playing his toy leisurely and carefree.
sentences.cn: 那男孩坐在那里, 自由自在地玩着玩具.

sentences.en: The pace of the book is leisurely, with enjoyable literary and historical asides.
sentences.cn: 这本书节奏明快，另外还穿插了一些趣味盎然的文史掌故。

sentences.en: The young couple paddled a little boat leisurely on the river.
sentences.cn: 那对年轻夫妇在河上悠闲地划着一条小船.

sentences.en: They set off at a leisurely pace.
sentences.cn: 他们步态悠闲地出发了。

sentences.en: Tweed walked at a leisurely pace.
We walked in a leisurely manner, looking in all the windows.
sentences.cn: 我们慢悠悠地走着, 看遍所有的橱窗.

sentences.en: We walked leisurely into the hotel.
sentences.cn: 我们慢悠悠地走回酒店。

trans.tran_cn: 从容的，不慌不忙的，悠闲的
trans.tran_en: A leisurely action is done in a relaxed and unhurried way
